resources.string: Color Brodcast allows you to set the color patern of your Pulse 2. Simply tap a square below to see its corisponding pattern on the Pulse 2. Additionally, you can tap a feature to the left or select the rebrodcast option to send the patern to other neaby Pulse 2s .
Select a number, a letter and a special character from the boxes below.

Request the ambient volume from the Pulse 2\'s microphone. The returned value is the average of several measurements taken over a 1 second interval. The returned value range is 0-99, with 99 being the loudest.
Capture a color value using the JBL Prism - Color Sensor Lens, on the back of the Pulse 2.
